string-array.name: carousel_push_notification
string-array.item: Send multiple images in a single notification to highlight promotions / products.

string-array.name: gif_push_notification
string-array.item: Send GIFs in your notification to grab users’ attention.

string-array.name: creative_studio_push_notification
string-array.item: Create a custom notification format to match your brand and use case.

string-array.name: animated_banner_push_notification
string-array.item: Catch users’ attention with animations a crowded notification center.

string-array.name: banner_push_notification
string-array.item: Stand out in a cluttered notification center with eye-catching notifications.

string-array.name: slider_push_notification
string-array.item: Send multiple big images in a notification, similar to the Carousel Push.
